articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: WWE CEO McMahon steps down as board investigates alleged misconduct
articles.description: WWE Inc said on Friday it launched an investigation into alleged misconduct by longtime Chief Executive Vince McMahon and appointed his daughter Stephanie as interim head.
